_sText: Hi... This is my first publicly released map. I made it for our clan's French public server. It's a night customisation of the original de_dust2 by David Johnston. The first challenge was to make the enemy visible during the action... I had to find a good palette of colours for the lighting, fog and the skybox 3D too :) ... All the well-loved various action zones are bright enough so you can easily recognize the enemy. But you know ... night is night, right. NEW STUFF: --------- ---> Site A: a ct vehicle and a little shelter. ---> Site B: 2 trucks and another shelter, with some computers and nuclear stuff inside. ---> T Spawn: A nice Helicopter. ---> MIDDLE: A tower which can be demolished with high explosives. The tower was already there in the original de_dust2, but I have made it climbable! But it's dangerous to camp inside the tower because of the detonator placed on "short A" ct path. You'll may like the view, however :) ...Its a good place to have a romance with a css-girl ! (lol..lol...) FOR FPS BANANA USERS: -------------------- I saw a "de_dust2_night" which is a nice map by 7th Graal on this site.... HONESTLY when this map appeard on the site I was already working on de_dust2_bynight_v1 :( I was a little disappointed :) ... but nevermind. I hope you'll like my map too. The fog in the map is a dreamy blue colour. Hope you'll enjoy the colour style of the overview ... which is also an original one! THANKS: to Predulus / S.E.A.L. for his knowledge and his good advice - he helped me a lot ... this man made de_paris and de_dustanesi! Very good maps that you can find on fps banana :) ... THX man ! You are my own personal Yoda :! Lastly, sorry for my English - I'm French :D ...
